exercise.instructions:
1. Add a comma after the 'decrement' object closing bracket '}'
2. Add the following new line: limit-range-max: 100

Note limit-range-max must be in double quotes.

1. Locate the EXOBJTBL_Data_t typedef structure. After the DecrLimit variable:
    Add the following line: uint16  LimitRangeMax;

1. Locate the JsonTblObjs[] declaration.
    Put a comma at the end of the 'TblData.DecrLimit.High' row
    Copy the '&TblData.LimitRangeMax' row from the lesson file to the source file
